mapper.sql: ID, EXPERT_ID, AUDIT_USER_ID, AUDIT_USER_NAME, AUDIT_REASON, AUDIT_RESULT, AUDIT_AT, IS_DELETED, SUGGEST_TYPE, AUDIT_FIELD, AUDIT_CONTENT, TYPE, "AUDIT_FIELD_ID", AUDIT_FALG
mapper.select: select * from T_SES_EMS_EXPERT_AUDIT where EXPERT_ID = #{expertId} and IS_DELETED = 0
select * from T_SES_EMS_EXPERT_AUDIT where EXPERT_ID = #{expertId} and AUDIT_RESULT = '1' and nvl(IS_DELETED,0) = 0
select * from T_SES_EMS_EXPERT_AUDIT where AUDIT_RESULT = '1' and nvl(IS_DELETED,0) = 0

select sys_guid() from dual
mapper.update:
update T_SES_EMS_EXPERT_AUDIT
EXPERT_ID = #{expertId},
AUDIT_USER_ID = #{auditUserId},
AUDIT_USER_NAME = #{auditUserName},
AUDIT_REASON = #{auditReason},
AUDIT_RESULT = #{auditResult},
AUDIT_AT = #{auditAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted},
SUGGEST_TYPE = #{suggestType},
AUDIT_FIELD = #{auditField},
AUDIT_CONTENT = #{auditContent},
TYPE = #{type},
where ID = #{id}

update T_SES_EMS_EXPERT_AUDIT set EXPERT_ID = #{expertId}, AUDIT_USER_ID = #{auditUserId}, AUDIT_USER_NAME = #{auditUserName}, AUDIT_REASON = #{auditReason}, AUDIT_RESULT = #{auditResult}, AUDIT_AT = #{auditAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TYPE = #{type}, IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted} SUGGEST_TYPE = #{suggestType}, AUDIT_FIELD = #{auditField}, AUDIT_CONTENT = #{auditContent} where ID = #{id}
update T_SES_EMS_EXPERT_AUDIT set IS_DELETED = 1 where EXPERT_ID =#{expertId}
